page.title: 10NARBERTH TOWN
page.content: NARBERTH IS QUITE A BIG TOWN IN THE CENTRAL AGRICULTURAL AREA OF PEMBROKESHIRE THERE ARE A LOT OF SHOPS A CHINESE RESTUARANT AND A FISH AND CHIPS SHOP.THERE ARE LOTS OF PEOPLE IN NARBERTH (1072) AND A LOT OF CHILDREN. WE HAVE A HEALTH CENTRE AND A OLD PEOPLES HOME CALLED SUNNYBANK. WE HAVE A POLICE STATION AND A FIRE STATION. CARDING MILL LANE IS A POPULAR WALK THIS LEADS SOUTH WEST FROM THE MOOR.THE TOWN MOOR HAS A SAND PIT AN ADVENTURE PLAYGOUND AND A PLAYFIELD WITH SWINGS AND SLIDES.THERE ARE LOTS OF FIELDS AROUND THE LANE.IVE LIVED IN NARBERTH FOR ELEVEN YEARS AND I LIVE IN A COUNCIL HOUSE.I THINK ITS A NICE TOWN AND YOU WOULD LIKE IT TOO.
